description:
'''Mireya Cecilia Ramona Pantoja Levi''' (21 October 1943 â€“ 24 July 2023), better known simply as '''Cecilia''' or '''Cecilia la Incomparable''', was a Chilean singer-songwriter, and a member of the ''[[nueva ola]]'' music movement.

Pantoja was considered by some critics as the greatest teen star of the mid-1960s and the most prominent and influential act of the [[nueva ola]] movement.
